about_the_game:
Refresh your characters' appearance with new skins! In this DLC you will find exclusive looks for the characters of the visual novel. Skins will be added over time.

Durka Simulator is a free-to-play game, and purchasing this DLC will support the development of the game. If you are buying this, a big THANK YOU!
detailed_description:
Refresh your characters' appearance with new skins! In this DLC you will find exclusive looks for the characters of the visual novel. Skins will be added over time.

Durka Simulator is a free-to-play game, and purchasing this DLC will support the development of the game. If you are buying this, a big THANK YOU!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 180 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 180 MB available space

name: New Image - Durka Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
